url.description: Original url of the phishing website

phishtank-id.description: Phishtank ID of the reported phishing

phishtank-detail-url.description: Phishtank detail URL to the reported phishing

submission-time.description: When the phishing was submitted and/or reported

verified.description: The phishing has been verified by the team handling the phishing

online.description: If the phishing is online and operational, by default is yes

takedown-time.description: When the phishing was taken down

description: Phishing template to describe a phishing website and its analysis.
name: phishing
